bibl.title: Report on the Excavations at Abu Mina in Spring 2003.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.note: D.A.I. Excavations, May 5 to May 31, 2003. - 1. The small apartment house. - 2. The colonnade of the western portico. - 3. The so-called staircase-building. - 4. Further investigations in the mud brick chapel at the house with the portico.
GROSSMANN Peter, Report on the Excavations at Abu Mina in Spring 2003.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 43 (2004) pp. 33-43, 5 plans et pll. VII-X.
